title: Skin shards are so worthless now
body:
That rerolling them is pretty much forced.

https://image.prntscr.com/image/ICpz-zVZS0eKulclJqNj1w.png
https://image.prntscr.com/image/imtdlAziQgmHkKFz9yXvCw.png

Note that you can reroll 3 skins for a random skin... and that these aren't even worth more then a third of their essence for disenchanting.

replies.body: Notice how they've said nothing about it, because they're trying to be sneaky and force more money out of players. Disgusting

At least we CAN still reroll them... unlike champ shards...
With riot having their heads this deep in the sand, we should be thankful 
for even this small luxury...

I have honestly never seen a game go downhill as fast as League just has, even _For Honour_ didn't kill itself a single patch.
For Honor is given a bad name, its still a good game, just taken out of proportion by youtuber's trying to make a video.

Oh its a great game, but the developers didn't listen to the players, and it just leaked players like mad.

League is heading down that road.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/WZzpcfFQ-riots-loot-craftingscam?comment=0003 The whole system is there so you can dilute your money for 100% no return.. After everything you get, you then need either essence or more skin shards to make the skin. Like what the fuck is htat shit, you just payed 10x it's worth. And to make that blue essence you gotta destroy the rest of the shit you just got, to make one skin.. It's why they've gone to blue essence and made the numbers so high, so you don't realise how much money you spend for SUCH HIGH NUMBERS that are actually worth nothing anyway

When the new pre-season patch came out, I thought only the BE system was altered. 

Then when I went to disenchant my skin shards, I saw the value for them decrease significantly. 

I had saved up all my legendary battlecast kogmaw and skarner shards hoping to disenchant them in the future for a skin shard that I wanted in the future.

Now they're like you said, worthless.
